other_tests.findings: Decreased frequency of joint bleeding substantially.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Left elbow became increasingly symptomatic secondary to recurrent hemarthroses.

other_tests.findings: Severe degenerative arthritis with complete loss of articular cartilage.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Postoperative range of motion showed flexion of 140째 and extension loss of 10째; at six months it plateaued with flexion of 135째 and loss of extension of 30째 without loss of range of motion at one and two-year follow-ups.

other_tests.findings: Fibrinogen level was 0.3 g/L postoperatively and maintained at a minimum of 0.5 g/L.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Fibrinogen levels checked with dose changes peaked at a maximum of 1.4 g/L during the eighteen-week monitoring period.
